text: Right - the must have seriously been something behind the scenes stinking up Wisconsin for Gary to have bolted.  Maybe it's a simple as he AD didn't get along or something like that, but there had to have been something.
But this is totally an par with Rich-Rod, Graham, Sonny, and Leach
I heard that Andersen was trying to get Wisconsin to loosen up their academic requirements. And i think their AD is an ass.
And OSU announced some $40 Million facilities upgrade yesterday. Probably didn't hurt.
right.   Riley wants to give them a double bird for that move too.
He bitched about facilities year in and year out - and the answer was always "we are paying down our debt"
I always wondered why it felt like all the other Pac 12 teams were spending that new TV money, except OSU.
The question is, did Riley leaving make them pull the $42m makover out of their ass, or had that been in the works and Riley left knowing it was coming.
i think it was in the works

Have you seen renderings?  Usually when you announce that stuff if it's been in the works you have renderings that you a showing the board of trustees for approval and stuff.   I haven't seen any of that floating on the internets - which makes me think it was an oh shit when Riley left and they pulled it out of their ass once they realized they had to put up to get a decent coach.

It sounded familiar when i heard it yesterday, but maybe you're right. "Mike Goodwin, president and CEO of the Oregon State University Foundation, said that anonymous gifts totaling $25 million have been secured for the project."
<http://www.osubeavers.com/ViewArticle.dbml?DB_OEM_ID=30800&ATCLID=209802574>

text: It sounds to me like this is all post-Riley reaction
